reg_info.act_under: Registered Insurance Brokers Act   Loi sur les courtiers d’assurances inscrits

content.content: 1. Every member in good standing of the Risk Management Consultants of Ontario who provides only risk management consulting services and who does not engage in any other activity normally carried out by an insurance broker is exempt from the provisions of the Act and the regulations. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 990, s. 1.
